txt.en:
Good Adventurer,

New comrades (and fearsome foes) are coming to this world! 

The new transfer process is now available via the game launcher. A number of other worlds will be closing and their inhabitants will be moving to the worlds that will remain, including this one. At the same time, the servers that power our worlds are moving and being upgraded. As a result, the remaining worlds will be able to host more players with improved performance.

We hope that you will extend a warm welcome to the newcomers and help them feel at home here. Some small gifts have been placed in your inventory in thanks for your patience during this transition.

While no action is required of you during the server consolidation, all transfers are free during the event. If you wish to transfer your account:
1. Detach any items from your in-game mail that you wish to keep
2. Choose a remaining world or worlds for your move (see the list below)
3. Open the game launcher and click the drop-down arrow at the top right of the window
4. Follow the instructions in the transfer wizard.

For more updates and information, please visit the Lord of the Rings Online website and follow us on social media.

Here is the list of worlds that will remain after the server consolidation is complete.

US:
Brandywine
Gladden
Landroval
Crickhollow
Arkenstone

EU:
Laurelin
Gwaihir
Sirannon
Evernight
Belegaer
